verbose_text: At this point of understanding, it would be reasonable to breed double deficient mice, which express neither IL-6 nor IL-6R (Il-6 - / - / Il-6r - / -), and challenge them in comparison with Il-6 - / - / Il-6r +/+, Il-6 +/+ / Il-6r - / - and Il-6 +/+ / Il-6r +/+ mice in a model of DSS induced colitis.
evidence: Il-6r -  /  -  and Il-6 +/+ /Il-6r +/+  mice in a model of DSS-induced
